/notes/Archive/Special-Syntax-in-Theme-T.title: Special Syntax in Theme Things 2
/notes/Archive/Special-Syntax-in-Theme-T.content:
## Basic
- [ ] to-do
- [/] incomplete
- [x] done
- [-] canceled
- [>] forwarded
- [<] scheduling

## Extras
- [?] question
- [!] important
- [*] star
- ["] quote
- [l] location
- [b] bookmark
- [i] information
- [S] savings
- [I] idea
- [p] pros
- [c] cons
- [f] fire
- [k] key
- [w] win
- [u] up
- [d] down
